data.title: End Credits #79: Bee Movie (Paramount/DreamWorks)
data.meta_description: Read End Credits #79: Bee Movie (Paramount/DreamWorks) from the story My End Credits book: Volume I by RVengerOfficial (The guy who can do things XD) with 147...
data.text:
*gasps* Bee Movie?! My favorite anime about a bee and a girl kinda getting into a relationship, while the bee tries to sue the humans for stealing their honey! XD

Requested by Princessb237. Let's do this thing. Yeah, I said it differently!

Part of the May 2021 Monthly Challenge.

Directed by

Simon J. Smith

Steve Hickner

Produced by

Jerry Seinfeld

Christina Steinberg

Written by

Jerry Seinfeld and Spike Feresten & Barry Marder & Andy Robin

Music by

Rupert Gregson-Williams

Executive Music Producer

Hans Zimmer

Editor

Nick Fletcher, a.c.e.

Production Designer

Alex McDowell, RDI

Visual Effects Supervisor

Doug Cooper

Art Direction and Character Design

Christophe Lautrette

Associate Producer

Cameron Stevning

Head of Story

David Pimentel

Head of Character Animation

Fabio Lignini

Head of Layout

Nol L. Meyer

Deven R. Letendre
